alert.note: Alert for Clay (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Central Illinois (Central and East Central Illinois)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 30 at 5:21PM CDT until March 30 at 5:45PM CDT by NWS Central Illinois
info.description: The National Weather Service in Lincoln has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Clay County in south central Illinois... * Until 545 PM CDT. * At 520 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Xenia, or 10 miles west of Flora, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Flora around 535 PM CDT. Louisville around 540 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Clay City, Bible Grove, Sailor Springs and Ingraham. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CDT for south central and southeastern Illinois. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
